FirstDialog.Name: Asther
FirstDialog.text: I think i'm going to be late for my meeting with Julie.

FirstDialog.Name: Asther
FirstDialog.text: I should go and change into some nice clothing.

FirstDialog.Name: Asther
FirstDialog.text: Alright! All set, let's go to Julie's shop.

SecondDialog.name: Julie
SecondDialog.text: Asther! You finally came here, I thought you were going to leave all those cookies for me to bake alone.

SecondDialog.name: Asther
SecondDialog.text: Oh boy! It really is late... I'm sorry about that dear I got distracted by my Tv Shows.

SecondDialog.name: Julie
SecondDialog.text: You and your tv shows, it's ok, a few hours of waiting don't do much to me, I entertained myself with costumers and other stuff. I would want to start these cookies without you honestly.

SecondDialog.name: Asther
SecondDialog.text: It's Always best with a buddy next to you!

SecondDialog.name: Julie
SecondDialog.text: If they can bake of course.

SecondDialog.name: Julie
SecondDialog.text: Well, it's time to get those cookies going.

ThirdDialog.name: Julie
ThirdDialog.text: Mar I can't believe you right now, What is all this mess?!?

ThirdDialog.name: Mar
ThirdDialog.text: Im sorry, I just wanted to cook like you

ThirdDialog.name: Julie
ThirdDialog.text: Alright, I'll take care of this mess just go back up to the house and we'll talk about this later.

ThirdDialog.name: Julie
ThirdDialog.text: Oh that child can be a handful sometimes.

ThirdDialog.name: Julie
ThirdDialog.text: Looks like she destroyed all of the eggs tooâ€¦ Well, would you help me clean this mess please?

FourthDialog.name: Julie
FourthDialog.text: Thank you for helping me clean this up. Could you please go to the merchant next door and buy some eggs

FourthDialog.name: Asther
FourthDialog.text: Of course! its no bother at all.

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: Hello! I see you are new here in town.
Oh yea, I've only been in town for about 2 weeks or so.

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: That's lovely, it's always nice to see new people in town. Every time I come to town it feels like there is more people around. It is so nice to see our small town grow.
Now that you mention it, it does seem to be a growing town, maybe ill stay here for longer than imagined.

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: Oh hoho, thats great, I will definitely be looking forward to seeing you around.

FifthDialog.name: Micky
FifthDialog.text: Oh by the way, the names Micky.

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: Such a nice name for such handsome boy.

FifthDialog.name: Micky
FifthDialog.text: Oh you're going to make me blush, What brings you here anyways, I sell everything at the cheapest price, not to mention the best products of their kind.

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: Thats great my dear, how much will it be for a few eggs? Maybe half a dozen eggs?

FifthDialog.name: Micky
FifthDialog.text: Boy you are in luck, I make my own produce coming from beautiful Patricia over there, They are about 20$ but since you seem to be such a  beautiful lady, I'll leave them for 5$. What do you say?

FifthDialog.name: Asther
FifthDialog.text: Such a discount, you are so nice, I will definitely take this great discount.

FifthDialog.name: Micky
FifthDialog.text: Alright, I'm glad you took this opportunity, here you go.

SixthDialog.name: Julie
SixthDialog.text: You are back, that was quick! Did you get the eggs.

SixthDialog.name: Asther
SixthDialog.text: Yea, the merchant was really nice and he even gave me a discount for the eggs.

SixthDialog.name: Julie
SixthDialog.text: That's really nice from him, Well, we should go and prepare the cookies.

SeventhDialog.name: Julie
SeventhDialog.text: Alright, lets do this. Let me explain a little bit what we have to do, I know you can be a little forgetful.

SeventhDialog.name: Julie
SeventhDialog.text: So what we are going to do, you get me the items by clicking them with your cursor, then you will bring it back to me and I will mix them together in the bowl over there.

SeventhDialog.name: Julie
SeventhDialog.text: We have limited time to do these cookies so you gotta be fast, not that its hard for you since you've always been the fast one.

SeventhDialog.name: Julie
SeventhDialog.text: Can you get me the flour?

EightDialog.name: Julie
EightDialog.text: That was awesome, we did a great job!

EightDialog.name: Julie
EightDialog.text: Here are the cookies, You should actually go and give the merchant some of the cookies we made as a thanks for the discount.

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Hi! I see you are new here in town.
Oh... uhhh Hi, how are you doing?

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Doing really well thank you for asking
I'm glad you're doing good darling. So, What do you want buy?

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Well I came here to look for some eggs, about 6 of them.
Alright, I guess I could give you that discount again, that'll be 5$. Why do you need so many eggs?

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Again...? Neveming that. Well, I am going to cook some cookies next door with the baker- uhhh Jules.
Thats great, I hope I get to taste those before they're gone, I heard they're pretty good.

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Now let me look for the mo- Oh my dear, I have a cookie here myself, Do you want it?
Do I?!?! Of course, tell you what, I'll give you the eggs for free, here you go.

NinthDialog.name: Asther
NinthDialog.text: Oh my, what a generous fox, thank you so much. What is your name?

NinthDialog.name: Micky
NinthDialog.text: The name's Micky, I know it can be hard to remember so you can ask, dont feel bad about it. We are basically family by now anyways.

TenthDialog.name: Julie
TenthDialog.text: Oh hi, you are back already!

TenthDialog.name: Asther
TenthDialog.text: Ju-Jules.... ? yea, I have the eggs here.

TenthDialog.name: Julie
TenthDialog.text: Hey, are you ok? is everything alright?

TenthDialog.name: Asther
TenthDialog.text: Yea yea, I'm alright, Did you get a new cashier working for you?

TenthDialog.name: Julie
TenthDialog.text: Ummmm, no, this is Richie- Are you ok? are you feeling a little tired?

TenthDialog.name: Julie
TenthDialog.text: I think you should go and get some rest in your house. Here, I'll accompany you.

FinishingQuest.name: Julie
FinishingQuest.text: Alright, Wait here I am going to go and get some water

FinishingQuest.name: Asther
FinishingQuest.text: Alright, I will be here waiting.
